body:
That's true, but the decisions we make at this fundamental level effect the
Go ecosystem as a whole. Code is usually read by many more people than just
its authors.

cc @rob_pike

On 8 May 2015 at 10:21, Adam Sadovsky <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> Well, it would be up to the code owner to decide whether they prefer to
> see go vet false positives or "// vet:ignore" comments. Right now, we don't
> let them choose.
>

> <https://github.com/golang/go/issues/10752#issuecomment-100053630>.
